---
title: "Benchmarking crime in London against other global cities"
date: "2022-12-20"
---

Citation: M Ashby, M Bal, G Croci, A Fuller, N Mantl, Y Lee. 2022. _Benchmarking crime in London against other global cities_. London: Centre for Global City Policing.

[Published version (open access)](https://discovery.ucl.ac.uk/id/eprint/10183479/){.btn .btn-primary}

This report compares serious crime recorded by police in London to serious crime in 19 other global cities – large cities in developed countries around the world – to better understand changing patterns of serious crime.
